phrases: Give me just a moment, please!
Yunosagi is going to be covered
in the next issue of that magazine.
Then are you going to have to go through this, too?
Our staff are really worried about that part.
I guess a high ranking toward the top
means more customers will come, right?
Kissuiso needs to work harder, too!
if they come and my picture ends up in their magazine?
Maybe I should go to a beauty salon...
There is no way that will work.
plan you have ever come up with.
But Takako said that advertising is the first
One night stay with two free meals
and the most important thing to do in our business.
If you are free, lend me a hand!
So, you do realize that we are free.
yet we only have a single group of customers.
I know, that is why I am making complimentary passes...
Yes, we are pleased to hear from you again!
Of course, we will be waiting!
And how many people will be staying?
It is rare to see you do the shopping.
Apparently, we suddenly have a lot of customers.
Yunosagi's going to be covered in a magazine!
information for the rankings right now!
Do not you think it will be crazy if Kissuiso gets
ranked number one and the inn fills up with customers?
Madam Manager's bitter face will finally smile!
Thanks for working so hard all this time!
Now, go and have some fun with this money!
And we will go to a hot spring...
That does not differ from what we normally do, right?
Are not you off work today?
How many customers did you say are arriving?
Seven groups; twenty customers in total.
Our frequent customers booked the same period as the other reservations.
But there is no way we can refuse a customer
when we have free rooms, right?
If we are unable to give the customers our full attention,
you will have to learn to turn them away.
So, have you informed Mr. Ren yet?
Tohru's taking the day off today,
but he says it will be fine regardless.
So, the only area we lack in is...
To be honest, I am not confident that Ohana and I
will be able to serve this many customers.
If it is necessary, I will rush in and help too.
After all, I once used to be a waitress too.
She looks like she is having fun.
Man, I want a day off too!
Do not you have days off as well?
I just want to hurry up and learn all my tasks.
Oh, but maybe if you keep working during all your breaks
Tohru will be overjoyed and fall in love with you!
You have a bad habit of suddenly walking fast.
I will call the young master!
Please do not yell when you are in this condition.
She was feeling all right lately too...
Well, it happens fairly often, so I am sure she will be fine.
Are not you going to go?
How can we run this inn if both of us are gone?
There is a lot of customers today.
I need to do my best!
Are you Ms. Sui Shijima's relative?
We will perform another examination tomorrow morning.
I could not instantly respond to Ms. Shijima.
We suddenly have a lot of customers.
I bet everyone is having a hard time without a full staff.
But you are also having a hard time!
things like this happen every now and then.
Still, why did not you let me call an ambulance?
If someone were to call an ambulance,
All I ever hear you say is the customer.
Because that is what this job is all about.
I will not come here and visit you again.
Hi, you have reached Sakki's cell!
Please leave your message after the tone,
and keep it under 20 seconds please!
If I were to call him right now,
what would I say to him?
What is that supposed to mean?
I am actually on a train, on the way to see you.
Like I said, I am on a train.
Are you on your way to work?
I have the feeling that Ko
said something about coming to see me...
Then can I get you to take some snacks to the Wisteria Room?
What on Earth are you doing?
I am in the middle of an important mission.
Oh, you are back from the hospital.
Can you join this meeting then?
I am kind of in the middle of something...
And that is exactly why we need to brainstorm.
Excuse me, but I also have work to get back to...
I have worked for 15 years in order to become a writer.
It looks like it is finally time for my well-trained
observation abilities to see the light of day.
Let us hear what you have got.
the ones that are suspicious are the two women in the Moon Room
and the man in the Wave Room.
Our target is one of those two groups, no doubt about it.
There must be a reason that so many customers...
are showing up during the off season.
It is logical to assume that there are
mystery guests working for magazines staying at Kissuiso!
There is no time like the present!
Let this chance go and there will not be a next time!
We will find out who the mystery guest is
and show them the time of their life,
resulting in us scoring high in the rankings!
So, you are saying we should prioritize customers?
B-But what about the other customers?
We will be giving the other customers the
same kind of service we have always given them.
We are just going to be giving
Only amateurs let emotions get in the way.
It is our only chance to revive Kissuiso, Ohana!
We have got no time to lose!
You are all going to follow my plan.
I will need you to get ready as well, Mr. Jiro.
Hey you, can you take me to the kitchen?
Do not tell me you are telling us to give
the potential mystery guests a better meal?
It starts with a meal and ends with a meal.
is the most critical time for Kissuiso!

And the person who will make it...
Yes, that one is very popular.
And this is one of them.
During this season, I would say...
I wonder if this is okay.
I feel like something is off.
If you are worried, go and check up on her.
Nah, if I did that, she would let me have it.
Besides, she told me she was counting on me.
Now that I think about it, she was saying
something about an account book in her room...
I will take care of that for you.
I wonder if everyone from around here is like this.
she is got so many details written down
What time are the Ariyoshis checking in again?
Mr. Ren seems to be acting strange.
He is working, but he is not acting like himself.
He is actually bad at working under pressure.
we will not be able to prepare dinner for all the customers in time!
What are we going to do?
That is probably the best option.
Well, if there is no other option...
If we were to do something like that,
we would be scolded by the Madam Manager.
A lot, precisely because I have been scolded by her lots!
thus, we need to treat them all equally.
That is what Madam Manager lives for!
That is what Kissuiso stands for!
But, Ohana, we do not have enough time,
nor do we have enough people.
he is attending a marriage today in the city.
I can help out with the preparations for cooking,
but I cannot cook anything yet, and I...
I cannot be of any help,
Sorry to make you all wait!
Please take care of this, Nakochi.
And lend me the key to your bike.
What I am doing right now was well thought out...
but I am still a bit uncertain
Hang on just a little longer.
I do not know where exactly Tohru is...
That just means I will need to look everywhere.
